events.name: Awaken Your Senses! Through Sound Meditation (1/3)
events.description: "Listen to the wind, it talks. Listen to the silence, it speaks. Listen to your heart, it knows."- Native American ProverbIn everyday's conversations we often talk but forgot to listen. We often speak, but forgot to hear.Our mind is a clutter of chatters and noises where wisdom doesn't come through.How do we have a clarity of mind? How do we clear the clouds inside our head?What does our heart truly say? How can we hear ourself? How do we connect better?Quantum Zazen is for everyone. It is a place of clarity and connection and where silence speaks the loudest.It is a place where we feel centered, balanced, and focused. It is a place where we know exactly where we are.If you'd like to have a clarity of mind, focus, direction, or answers to your own questions, this place is for you!In this series of Awaken Your Senses meditation, we will focus on our ears to listen to the sounds outside and inside our self.Find your inner strength to leap further in all aspects of your life.Connect to the silence, and find the loudest noise that calls you forward or drag you backward.When: Saturday, 03 June. 08:30 am - 11:00 amWhere: Berlayer Shade at Labrador ParkFree of charge! Contributions are welcomed. Register now for the limited seats! @ tinyurl.com/qzazen Check out our page at: www.facebook.com/quantumzazen
events.location: Berlayer Shade at Labrador Park, Labrador Nature Reserve, Singapore 119187

events.name: Quantopian Workshop: Introduction to Algorithmic Trading - PAID EVENT
events.description:
We would like to invite you to our Quantopian Workshop: Introduction to Algorithmic Trading on June 3rd at the Hilton Hotel in Singapore. This workshop, led by Anthony Ng, will give you the ability to navigate the world of quantitative finance by focusing on core principles of rigorous statistical research to teach overall intuitions so you’re comfortable learning more on your own. We hope you can join us. Reserve your spot here! Introduction Topics and Exercises Include: • Introduction to the Research Environment • Introduction to Pairs Trading • Best Practices in Quantitative Research • Overfitting • Backtesting 



This is a paid event - to sign up and for more information, please see the event page here. For this session, we have set up different ticket levels. We trust you to pick your fair registration rate: - Corporate Rate $699.00: If your company is paying for you to attend, please select the Corporate option.  - Individual Rate $499.00: If you are paying for yourself to attend, please select this rate. - Student Rate $150.00: This rate is only for students and academics.  For more information and to RSVP, please click here.

events.name: HHSG BUILD

events.name: PyDataSG friends at Google - Going be­yond Data Science
events.description:
Our friends at Google are hosting an event about Data Science and Beyond.  Details at: https://events.withgoogle.com/going-beyond-data-science/ Google APAC is hosting a half-day event on June 3rd for data scientists covering several elements all the way from querying analytics data to data pipeline processing to also the next evolution of data with Machine Learning and AI Chatbots. Hope to see you there in this journey. 

URL to signup =  https://events.withgoogle.com/going-beyond-data-science/
events.location: Google Asia Pacific, Mapletree Business City, 70 Pasir Panjang Rd, Singapore 117371
